summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced crop health monitoring application. Backend APIs working excellently (91.7% success rate) including new KML parsing functionality. Frontend successfully implements all major enhancements: enhanced landing page with stats, automatic sample field creation, green color scheme, satellite map layer toggle, and KML upload tabs. Minor UI interaction issues identified but core functionality working.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

ui_bugs.issue: KML file input interaction may have timing issues
Map drawing interaction may have timing issues with coordinate capture

integration_issues.issue: Field editing interaction may have selector or timing issues

passed_tests: Enhanced landing page with 50K+ farms, 2M+ acres, 98% satisfaction stats
Landing page features: Satellite & Drone Mapping, AI Analytics, Weather Integration
User registration creates sample field automatically
Dashboard displays sample field after signup
Green color scheme throughout application (gradients, text, backgrounds)
Map layer toggle between street and satellite view working
Add field dialog has tabs for 'Draw on Map' and 'Upload KML'
KML parsing API functionality working correctly
Health index color coding with green theme
Field list displays with green styling
Map displays fields with green polygons
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fixes needed: 1) KML upload tab interaction timing, 2) Field creation via map drawing coordinate capture, 3) Field editing workflow selectors. All major enhancement features are working correctly.
